channel.title: Problems with files read /allocation
channel.description: seems like I have some issues with samples. I've tried reading a raw file with wave play fn from the card, and also allocating space in SDRAM (using table play next) with RAW files and it glitches like hell. Using Wav will result in white noise almost. I'm on latest software and firmware.test.axp (2.1 KB)

item.title: Problems with files read /allocation
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Yes use Audacity. First change project to 16 bit 48khz. Then export the file as raw using option 16-bit PCM.

But you found out so all good Have fun with it. Axoloti and samples are fun

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with files read /allocation
item.dc:creator: @Tobor Giorgio Sancristoforo
item.description:
@Tobor wrote:

SOLVED. Seems like that the raw conversion I did was not good. Tried to export in Audacity and now it works.
sorry!

Read full topic
